trans-unit.source: #[Take one picture of yourself a day, automatically generate a movie!](http://jlengrand.github.com/FaceMovie/)
trans-unit.target: ＃[每天拍摄一张自己的照片，自动生成电影！]（http://jlengrand.github.com/FaceMovie/）

trans-unit.source: $ Facemoviefier -h
trans-unit.target: $ Facemoviefier -h

trans-unit.source: $ Facemoviefier -i "../data/input/Axel" -o "../data/output" -p "profile face"
trans-unit.target: $ Facemoviefier -i“ ../数据/输入/轴” -o“ ../数据/输出” -p“轮廓面”

trans-unit.source: $ Facemoviefier -i "../data/input/Axel" -o "../data/output" -t i
trans-unit.target: $ Facemoviefier -i“ ../数据/输入/轴” -o“ ../数据/输出” -ti

trans-unit.source: $ Facemoviefier -i input_folder -o output_folder
trans-unit.target: $ Facemoviefier -i input_folder -o output_folder

trans-unit.source: $ Facemoviefier -i input_folder -o output_folder -r haar_cascades_folder_location
trans-unit.target: $ Facemoviefier -i input_folder -o output_folder -r haar_cascades_folder_location

trans-unit.source: $ Facemoviefier -p ?
trans-unit.target: $ Facemoviefier -p吗？

trans-unit.source: $ Facemoviefier.exe -h
trans-unit.target: $ Facemoviefier.exe -h

trans-unit.source: $ Facemoviefier.exe -i "../data/input/samples" -o "../data/output"
trans-unit.target: $ Facemoviefier.exe -i“ ../数据/输入/样本” -o“ ../数据/输出”

trans-unit.source: $ cd my\cloned\folder
trans-unit.target: $ cd我的\克隆的\文件夹

trans-unit.source: $ cd my\installation\folder
trans-unit.target: $ cd我的\安装\文件夹

trans-unit.source: $ pip install Facemovie
trans-unit.target: $ pip安装Facemovie

trans-unit.source: $ python Facemoviefier.py -h
trans-unit.target: $ python Facemoviefier.py -h

trans-unit.source: $ sudo aptitude install python-opencv libcv2.3 libcvaux2.3 libhighgui2.3 libopencv-contrib2.3 libopencv-gpu2.3 python-numpy
trans-unit.target: $ sudo aptitude install python-opencv libcv2.3 libcvaux2.3 libhighgui2.3 libopencv-contrib2.3 libopencv-gpu2.3 python-numpy

trans-unit.source: **FaceMovie** is a simple project that aims at helping you create videos of yourself over time, using photos as input.
trans-unit.target: ** FaceMovie **是一个简单的项目，旨在通过使用照片作为输入，帮助您随着时间的推移创建自己的视频。

trans-unit.source: **Feel free to [write some words here](https://github.com/jlengrand/FaceMovie/issues?state=open)** for any comment or request.
trans-unit.target: **随时[在此处写一些字]（https://github.com/jlengrand/FaceMovie/issues?state=open）**对于任何评论或要求。

trans-unit.source: **NOTE : ** If you are using Ubuntu 12.04, best of luck ! The opencv package is available in the main repo. Simply run :
trans-unit.target: **注意：**如果您使用的是Ubuntu 12.04，祝您好运！opencv软件包在主仓库中可用。只需运行：

trans-unit.source: **NOTE : ** In order to get good results, your images should contain only one person; and you should try to always keep the same angle with the camera for each of them.
trans-unit.target: **注意：**为了获得良好的效果，您的图片只能包含一个人；并且您应该尝试始终将它们与相机保持相同的角度。

trans-unit.source: **Optional :**
**Required :**

- -c, --crop : In this mode, final images are cropped so that only the desired part of the body is kept. This will remove parts of the input images, but will avoid addition of black borders in the output.
trans-unit.target: --c，--crop：在此模式下，将裁切最终图像，以便仅保留身体所需的部位。这将删除部分输入图像，但将避免在输出中添加黑色边框。

trans-unit.source: - -d, --cropdims : Expects two floats here. Ignored if crop mode is not selected. This allows to choose the window to be cropped. The values are defined in "number of face size".
trans-unit.target: --d，--cropdims：在这里需要两个浮点数。如果未选择裁剪模式，则忽略。这允许选择要裁剪的窗口。这些值在“面部尺寸数”中定义。

trans-unit.source: - -h, --help : Shows help message and exits
trans-unit.target: --h，--help：显示帮助消息并退出

trans-unit.source: - -i, --input : Input folder of the images to be processed
trans-unit.target: --i，--input：要处理的图像的输入文件夹

trans-unit.source: - -o, --output : Output folder where the final results will be saved
trans-unit.target: --o，--output：将保存最终结果的输出文件夹

trans-unit.source: - -p, --param : Used to change the file used to train the classifier. Useful you want to detect something else than front faces.
trans-unit.target: --p，--param：用于更改用于训练分类器的文件。有用的是您想要检测除正面以外的其他东西。

trans-unit.source: - -r, --root : Location of the facemovie folder. Required if you run the Facemovifier from an external location
trans-unit.target: --r，--root：facemovie文件夹的位置。如果从外部位置运行Facemovifier，则必选

trans-unit.source: - -s, --sort : The way used to sort images chronologically. Can be done either by using file names or EXIF metadata.
trans-unit.target: --s，--sort：按时间顺序对图像进行排序的方式。可以通过使用文件名或EXIF元数据来完成。

trans-unit.source: - -t, --type : The type of output to be created. Can be either images, video or simple display (nothing written on disc).
trans-unit.target: --t，--type：要创建的输出的类型。可以是图像，视频或简单显示（光盘上没有任何内容）。

trans-unit.source: - A folder called haar_cascades. It contains files used by the executable. Leave it in the same location as the executable by default.
trans-unit.target: -名为haar_cascades的文件夹。它包含可执行文件使用的文件。默认情况下，将其保留在与可执行文件相同的位置。

trans-unit.source: - EXIF
trans-unit.target: -EXIF

trans-unit.source: - The executable itself, called Facemovifier.exe.
trans-unit.target: -可执行文件本身，称为Facemovifier.exe。

trans-unit.source: - This README
trans-unit.target: -本自述文件

trans-unit.source: - [Complete documentation for the code.](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/doc.zip)
trans-unit.target: -[完整的代码文档。]（https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/doc.zip）

trans-unit.source: - [List of available haar cascades.](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/haarcascades.zip)
trans-unit.target: -[可用的haar级联列表。]（https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/haarcascades.zip）

trans-unit.source: - [Samples available to test the code.](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/samples.zip)
trans-unit.target: -[可用于测试代码的示例。]（https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/samples.zip）

trans-unit.source: - frontal face (default).
trans-unit.target: -正面（默认）。

trans-unit.source: - full body.
trans-unit.target: - 全身。

trans-unit.source: - images
trans-unit.target: - 图片

trans-unit.source: - lower body.
trans-unit.target: - 下半身。

trans-unit.source: - name (default)
trans-unit.target: -名称（默认）

trans-unit.source: - profile face.
trans-unit.target: -侧面。

trans-unit.source: - simple graphical display
trans-unit.target: -简单的图形显示

trans-unit.source: - upper body.
trans-unit.target: - 上半身。

trans-unit.source: - video
trans-unit.target: - 视频

trans-unit.source: An extensive list of training files is available while calling the helper, or by running the following command.
trans-unit.target: 在调用帮助程序时,或通过运行以下命令,可以获得一个广泛的训练文件列表。

trans-unit.source: And I used Gene Cash's library to extract information from EXIF metadata in the images.
trans-unit.target: 而我使用Gene Cash的库来提取图片中EXIF元数据的信息。

trans-unit.source: As a starter for my code, I used an excellent example from JAPSKUA, that you can find [here](http://japskua.wordpress.com/2010/08/04/detecting-eyes-with-python-opencv/)
trans-unit.target: 我使用了JAPSKUA的一个很好的例子作为我的代码的起点,你可以在[这里](http://japskua.wordpress.com/2010/08/04/detecting-eyes-with-python-opencv/)找到它。

trans-unit.source: Available modes :
trans-unit.target: 可用模式 :

trans-unit.source: Available parameters :
trans-unit.target: 可用参数 :

trans-unit.source: Available types :
trans-unit.target: 可用类型:

trans-unit.source: But you might also want to download :
trans-unit.target: 但你可能也想下载.NET技术。

trans-unit.source: By default, Facemovie is searching for frontal faces. You can change this by setting up which profile to use using the --profile (-p) option:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,Facemovie搜索的是正面人物。你可以通过使用--profile (-p)选项设置使用哪种配置文件来改变。

trans-unit.source: Download the archive available **[here](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/Facemovie-0.8.2-exe.zip)**.
trans-unit.target: 下载档案**[这里](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/Facemovie-0.8.2-exe.zip)**。

trans-unit.source: Due to its general implementation, FaceMovie may be used for faces, but also profiles (for projects showing [women along pregnancy for example](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CG_KArKYTq4) or full body([for people workouting](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=02Pzfv7JV48)). The only limitation comes from you !
trans-unit.target: 由于它的一般实现,FaceMovie可以用于脸部,也可以用于轮廓(用于显示[例如怀孕期间的妇女](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CG_KArKYTq4)或全身([用于人们锻炼](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=02Pzfv7JV48))。唯一的限制来自于你!

trans-unit.source: Facemovie also allows you to choose the type of output you want once the processing is done. This can be done by using the --type (-t) option. Here is the case where I save images instead of a movie in output.
trans-unit.target: Facemovie还允许你选择处理完成后的输出类型。这可以通过使用--type(-t)选项来完成。下面是我在输出中保存图像而不是电影的情况。

trans-unit.source: Facemovie is a work in progress, and I am not responsible for any corrpution it could cause to your data.
trans-unit.target: Facemovie是一项正在进行中的工作,我不对它可能对您的数据造成的任何损坏负责。

trans-unit.source: Facemovie is still under development, and you should consider it as work in progress.
trans-unit.target: Facemovie仍在开发中,您应将其视为正在进行的工作。

trans-unit.source: Facemovie needs the list of haar_cascades to correctly detect faces. This means that if you decide to run the Facemovie from another location, you should update the folders accordingly and use the root_folder option:
trans-unit.target: Facemovie需要haar_cascades列表来正确检测人脸。这意味着如果你决定从其他位置运行Facemovie,你应该相应地更新文件夹并使用root_folder选项。

trans-unit.source: Facemovie works with your images, so I feel like I need to write something about data usage.
trans-unit.target: Facemovie与你的图片一起使用,所以我觉得我需要写一些关于数据使用的东西。

trans-unit.source: For each of the following commands, __Facemovifier__ should be replaced by __FaceMovifier.exe__ or __python Facemovifier__ depending on your installation method.
trans-unit.target: 对于下面的每一个命令,__Facemovifier__应该被__FaceMovifier.exe__或__python Facemovifier__所取代,这取决于你的安装方法。

trans-unit.source: Here is a concrete example :
trans-unit.target: 下面是一个具体的例子 。

trans-unit.source: I also used the excellent [exif library](http://sourceforge.net/projects/exif-py/) to enhance sorting capabilities. It is embedded in the code, and you will not need to install it.
trans-unit.target: 我还使用了优秀的[exif库](http://sourceforge.net/projects/exif-py/)来增强排序功能。它被嵌入到代码中,你不需要安装它。

trans-unit.source: I never experienced any problem using the software, but you should always back up your data before using it.
trans-unit.target: 我在使用该软件时从未遇到过任何问题,但使用前一定要备份数据。

trans-unit.source: I see a growing interest for projects where people take one picture of themselves a day for several months (years ?) and compile it into a [video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6B26asyGKDo).
trans-unit.target: 我看到人们对一些项目的兴趣越来越大,在这些项目中,人们每天拍一张自己的照片,持续几个月(几年?),并将其编译成一个[视频](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6B26asyGKDo)。

trans-unit.source: I would enjoy having feedback if you like this idea, or even used it. Send me a link to your creations so that I can put them here !
trans-unit.target: 如果你喜欢这个想法,甚至使用了它,我会很高兴得到反馈。把你的作品链接发给我,这样我就可以把它们放在这里了!

trans-unit.source: If you do not have images to play with, note that an [archive including samples](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/samples.zip) is available.
trans-unit.target: 如果你没有图片可以玩,请注意,有一个[包括样本的档案](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/samples.zip)。

trans-unit.source: In order to check that everything is ready, open a command line in at the executable location and run the Facemovie helper :
trans-unit.target: 为了检查一切准备就绪,在可执行的位置打开命令行,运行Facemovie助手。

trans-unit.source: Lots of elements still have to be improved.
trans-unit.target: 很多元素还有待改进。

trans-unit.source: Now that FaceMovie is installed on your system, let's start playing with it !
trans-unit.target: 现在,FaceMovie已经安装在你的系统上,让我们开始玩它吧!

trans-unit.source: Once installed, let's start by calling the helper of Facemovie. It can be done by
trans-unit.target: 安装完毕后,我们先调用Facemovie的助手。它可以通过以下方式实现

trans-unit.source: Simply take several pictures of yourself in the same position, and decide when to compile everything into a video. Just indicate the location of your pictures, Facemovie does everything else for you.
trans-unit.target: 只需拍摄几张相同姿势的照片,然后决定何时将所有内容编入视频。只需标明图片的位置,Facemovie就能为你完成其他一切。

trans-unit.source: The Linux application is also available through a Python egg, available on [Pypi](http://pypi.python.org/pypi/Facemovie/0.8).
trans-unit.target: Linux应用程序也可以通过Python蛋获得,可在[Pypi](http://pypi.python.org/pypi/Facemovie/0.8)上获得。

trans-unit.source: The complete documentation for the code is **[available here](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/Facemovie-0.8.2_doc/index.html)**.
trans-unit.target: 完整的代码文档是**[在这里](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4286043/GH/FaceMovie/Facemovie-0.8.2_doc/index.html)**。

trans-unit.source: The idea of this project comes from an idea of Axel Catoire, currently [travelling around the world](http://ungrandtour.blogspot.com/) with his girlfriend.
trans-unit.target: 这个项目的想法来自于Axel Catoire的一个想法,他目前正和他的女朋友一起[环游世界](http://ungrandtour.blogspot.com/)。

trans-unit.source: The main difference with everyday is that Facemovie searches automatically for faces in the input images and compile them in the best possible way, so that your video look awesome.
trans-unit.target: 与日常的主要区别是Facemovie会自动搜索输入图片中的人脸,并以最好的方式进行编译,让你的视频看起来棒极了。

trans-unit.source: The next step is to try to create you first video. It is no more complex than running the following in command line :
trans-unit.target: 下一步是尝试创建你的第一个视频。它是没有比运行以下命令行复杂。

trans-unit.source: The whole aplication is developed using [Python2.7.3](http://www.python.org/download/). Any Python2.7 should be enough though.
trans-unit.target: 整个应用程序是用[Python2.7.3](http://www.python.org/download/)开发的。不过任何Python2.7都应该足够了。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways you can choose from to run Facemovie, each being developed below.
trans-unit.target: 有几种方法可以选择运行Facemovie,每种方法都在下面发展。

trans-unit.source: This command will list all the available parameters that can be used.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将列出所有可以使用的参数。

trans-unit.source: This is the current easiest solution, as it runs out of the box.
trans-unit.target: 这是目前最简单的解决方案,因为它是从盒子里跑出来的。

trans-unit.source: This means that for example -d 2 2 will output square images, of size 2 x the size of the subject face.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着,例如-d 2 2将输出正方形图像,尺寸为2 x被摄人脸的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: This project has been successfully tested on Windows 7 and Ubuntu 12.04 platforms.
trans-unit.target: 该项目已在Windows 7和Ubuntu 12.04平台上成功测试。

trans-unit.source: This project is released under the new BSD license (3 clauses version). You can read more about the license in the LICENSE file or direclty on [GNU's website](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/license-list.html#ModifiedBSD).
trans-unit.target: 本项目采用新的BSD许可证(3条款版本)发布。你可以在LICENSE文件中阅读更多关于许可证的内容,或者直接在[GNU网站](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/license-list.html#ModifiedBSD)上阅读。

trans-unit.source: Timelapse creation using Face Recognition
trans-unit.target: 使用人脸识别创建延时摄影

trans-unit.source: To check the code, simply open a command line and try to run the Facemovifier :
trans-unit.target: 要检查代码,只需打开一个命令行,并尝试运行Facemovifier 。

trans-unit.source: To run the application, you'll also need to install [Opencv](http://opencv.willowgarage.com/wiki/).
trans-unit.target: 要运行这个应用程序,你还需要安装[Opencv](http://opencv.willowgarage.com/wiki/)。

trans-unit.source: Uncompress the archive. It contains three elements :
trans-unit.target: 解压存档。它包含三个要素:

trans-unit.source: Version : 0.8.2

When searching on the web, I realized that there was only one software allowing people to do this : the [everyday paid iphone app](http://www.everyday-app.com). I hope that Facemovie can help some of you!
trans-unit.target: 在网上搜索的时候,发现只有一个软件可以让大家这样做:【天天付费iphone应用】(http://www.everyday-app.com)。希望Facemovie能帮到你们中的一些人!

trans-unit.source: Where input_folder is the repository where all your images are stored, and output_folder where you want the results to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 其中 input_folder 是存储所有图像的存储库,output_folder 是你希望保存结果的地方。

trans-unit.source: You are now ready to use the Facemovie !
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以使用Facemovie了!

trans-unit.source: You can **[have a look here](https://github.com/jlengrand/FaceMovie/issues?state=open)** to see my next objectives.
trans-unit.target: 你可以**[在这里看看](https://github.com/jlengrand/FaceMovie/issues?state=open)**看看我接下来的目标。

trans-unit.source: You can also simply clone the project from Github and use it as you wish.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以简单地从Github上克隆项目,并根据你的意愿使用它。

trans-unit.source: You can contact me at julien at lengrand dot fr, or on my [current website](http://www.lengrand.fr).
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过julien at lengrand dot fr或我的[当前网站](http://www.lengrand.fr)联系我。

trans-unit.source: You can then simply install Facemovie using [pip] (http://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip):
trans-unit.target: 然后你可以使用[pip](http://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip)简单地安装Facemovie。

trans-unit.source: depending whether you used the installer or the Python egg.
trans-unit.target: 取决于您使用的是安装程序还是 Python 蛋。

trans-unit.source: git clone git://github.com/jlengrand/FaceMovie.git
trans-unit.target: git clone git://github.com/jlengrand/FaceMovie.git
